mapper.update: update application set room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, time_begin = #{timeBegin,jdbcType=TIME}, time_end = #{timeEnd,jdbcType=TIME}, room_target1 = #{roomTarget1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_target2 = #{roomTarget2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_target3 = #{roomTarget3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_state = #{noticeState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, application_user = #{applicationUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, application_dept = #{applicationDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where application = #{application,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select application, room_name, year, term, date, time_begin, time_end, room_target1, room_target2, room_target3, activity, notice_state, application_user, application_dept from application where application = #{application,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select application, room_name, year, term, date, time_begin, time_end, room_target1, room_target2, room_target3, activity, notice_state, application_user, application_dept from application
